General.Name: YaGuang Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: YaGuang Technology Group Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of military microwave electronic components in China. The company provides semiconductor devices and complete circuit boards, communication equipment, semiconductor spare parts, security equipment and yachts, business boats, and special ships primarily in China. It offers microwave hybrid integrated circuit modules and components, semiconductor devices and composite materials, metal materials; and multi-mixed materials for yachts, business boats, and special ships, as well as engages in ship repair and electronic components trading business. The company was formerly known as Sunbird Yacht Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YaGuang Technology Group Company Limited in January 2018. YaGuang Technology Group Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Yuanjiang, China.
